title: We Wentz There
description:
Mina and PFF's Sam Monson bounce around the Week 2 slate and discuss things like- being Geno curious, the variance of Carson Wentz, if Julio Jones is good again, a proverbial must win for Indy, and whether or not this is the worst Bill Belichick defense of all time.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
